text: Eghtɨ Aron uan otariba ko, me Anogoroghezir Danganimɨn aven ofa gamir gumazimɨn ingangarim damusɨ, ofa gamir dakozimɨn boroghɨn mangɨva, me trausiziar kabar aghuigh, egh dughiar igharazibar me na bativamin Purirpenimɨn aven mangɨsɨ me kamaghɨra damuam. Egh me kamaghɨn damighan kogh me osɨmtɨzim ikɨtɨ, kɨ me mɨsueghtɨ me arɨmɨghiregham. Eghtɨ Aron uan igiar borir gɨn otivamiba ko, me zurazurara Akar Gavgavir kɨ damuasa me mɨkemezibar gɨn mangam.”
